# Bitunix Referral Code 2026 — BITUNIXBONUS

> Exclusive Bitunix referral and VIP bonus promotion. Use code BITUNIXBONUS to unlock up to 7,700 USDT bonus, 77.7% trading fee discount, and instant VIP 2 status on Bitunix cryptocurrency exchange.

## Overview

Bitunix is a cryptocurrency derivatives exchange founded in 2021, ranked #10 on Coinglass among top global platforms. This site provides the exclusive referral code **BITUNIXBONUS** with full details on bonuses, VIP tiers, and how to claim them.

- Referral Code: BITUNIXBONUS
- Invite Code: ab9nr3
- Maximum Bonus: 7,700 USDT
- Fee Discount: 77.7%
- VIP Status: Instant VIP 2 for 30 days
- Minimum Deposit: $100

## Pages

- [Home](https://bintangjtobing.github.io/Bitunix-Referral-Code-2026/): Main landing page with referral offer, bonus calculator, VIP comparison, FAQ
- [Blog](https://bintangjtobing.github.io/Bitunix-Referral-Code-2026/#/blog): Crypto trading insights, guides, and Bitunix-related articles
- [Register on Bitunix](https://www.bitunix.com/register?inviteCode=ab9nr3&vipCode=BITUNIXBONUS): Sign up with referral code applied

## Key Sections (Home Page)

- Bonus Breakdown: 4-card layout showing all bonus components
- Bonus Calculator: Interactive tool to estimate your bonus based on deposit and trading volume
- How to Claim: 5-step guide to activate the referral bonus
- VIP Comparison Table: Standard vs VIP 2 vs VIP 3 fee and benefit comparison
- VIP Level-Up Program: For existing VIP members on other exchanges (Binance, OKX, Bybit, Bitget, KuCoin, Gate.io, HTX)
- Why Bitunix: 8 trust signals — awards, security, insurance, compliance
- 4th Anniversary Campaign: $4M USDT prize pool with Tesla giveaway
- FAQ: 6 commonly asked questions about the referral program

## Bonus Tiers

### Deposit Bonuses
- Sign up: 20 USDT
- Deposit $100+: +30 USDT
- Deposit $500+: +50 USDT
- Deposit $1,000+: +100 USDT
- Deposit $5,000+: +500 USDT

### Trading Volume Bonuses
- Trade $10,000+: +100 USDT
- Trade $50,000+: +400 USDT
- Trade $250,000+: +1,500 USDT
- Trade $1,000,000+: +5,000 USDT

### Total Maximum: 7,700 USDT
